form.PN:
glagol izgovarjamo
/s*@sp*ekt/
, samostalnik ali pridevnik pa
/s*Vspekt/
.

sense.def:
To suspect that something is the case
pomeni misliti, da je nekaj najverjetneje res.

seg.quote: People suspected that a secret deal had been made.

sense.def:
To suspect something
pomeni dvomiti, ali nečemu lahko zaupamo in se zanesemo na tisto.

seg.quote: I had many reasons for suspecting this approach.

sense.def:
To suspect someone of a crime
pomeni misliti, da je nekdo zakrivil določen zločin ali prestopek.

A suspect
je oseba, za katero mislimo, da je zakrivila določen zločin ali prestopek.

seg.quote: Last week police finally had a suspect for the murder.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
suspect
, tistemu ne moremo zaupati ali dvomimo, da je tisto pristno.

seg.quote: My friendliness was viewed as suspect by some people.
